title: Help Identify Business Card Logo Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144422im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_5632.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144422im_/http:/typophile.com/files/phone%20number_3857.png)

My client asked me to create their menu for them but I cannot figure out the main font ("Sakura Bana" and the phone number).  
I've tried WhattheFont but I could not identify the font I needed. Since the file's PDF was exported from Adobe Illustrator, the font's information is not available in the properties...

If there needs to be more information regarding this then I will be more than happy to add it. I suppose the next resource I could turn to is to contact the card designer him/herself (...though the card was made over a year ago).

Thank you!

Font: 

 No
author: Sakutora

comments.content: phone looks like [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144422/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/). Bold or Black.
